title: How to Find Gardening Tools Made in the USA (+ Great American Made Garden Tools!) - AllAmerican.org

subtasks: Check if tools are made of tempered or stainless steel.
Ensure handles are made from materials like rubber or plastic.
Locate the country of origin on the product or packaging.
Contact the brand if country of origin is not listed online.

tasks.task: Explore American brands for gardening tools.
subtasks: Consider Rogue Hoe Tools for durable hoes.
Look into Bully Tools for heavy-duty, affordable options.
Evaluate Wilcox All Pro Tools' stainless steel products.
Choose Fisher Blacksmithing for handcrafted, long-lasting tools.
Use Cobra Head's weeder and cultivator.
Check other YouTube videos for popular brands.
Visit allamerican.org for comprehensive research on tool brands.
